text: Thembekile Kimi Makwetu (1966 - 11 November 2020) was a South African accountant and politician. He was the Auditor-General of South Africa between 2013 and 2020 during the Jacob Zuma and Cyril Ramaphosa administrations. He was born in Cape Town, South Africa. Makwetu died of lung cancer on 11 November 2020 in Johannesburg at the age of 54.Outgoing Auditor General Kimi Makwetu Passes Away ==References== ==Other websites== *Website of the Auditor- General Category:South African businesspeople Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:South African politicians Category:People from Cape Town Category:1966 births
title: Thembekile Kimi Makwetu
